Class CBInt

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mellowtech.core.bytestorable.CBInt
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<CBInt>, BComparable<Integer,CBInt>, BStorable<Integer,CBInt>

    public class CBInt
extends Object
implements BComparable<Integer,CBInt>
    Wraps an int value as a ByteStorable

    1.0
    Author:
    Martin Svensson

      • byteCompare

        public int byteCompare(int offset1,
                       ByteBuffer bb1,
                       int offset2,
                       ByteBuffer bb2)
        Description copied from interface: BComparable
        Compares two objects that are represented as bytes in a ByteBuffers. Default implementation reads the objects and call their compareTo method. Subclasses should override
        Specified by:
        byteCompare in interface BComparable<Integer,CBInt>
        Parameters:
        offset1 - the offset in the buffer for the first object
        bb1 - buffer for the first object
        offset2 - the offset in the buffer for the second object
        bb2 - buffer for the second object
        Returns:
        a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as the first argument is less than, equal to, or greater than the second.
